file.name: openapi-authentication.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: /api/v1
    description: basepath for API v1
info:
  description: X-Road UI Authentication
  version: "1.0.2"
  title: X-Road UI Based API
  contact:
    name: Nordic Institute for Interoperability Solutions (NIIS)
    url: https://github.com/nordic-institute/X-Road-development/#enhancement-requests-and-error-reports
    email: info@niis.org
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
tags:
  - name: security server
    description: Security Server operations and API calls
  - name: central server
    description: Central Server operations and API calls
paths:
  /login:
    post:
      tags:
        - security server
      operationId: login
      description: Login with cookie authentication
      summary: Logs in and returns the authentication cookie
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: A JSON object containing the login and password.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >
            Successfully authenticated.
            The session ID is returned in a cookie named `JSESSIONID`. You need to include this cookie in subsequent requests.
          headers:
            Set-Cookie:
              description: session cookie
              schema:
                type: string
                minLength: 1
                maxLength: 255
                example: JSESSIONID=abcde12345; Path=/;
            "\0Set-Cookie":
              description: XSRF token
              schema:
                type: string
                example: XSRF-TOKEN=fghijk678910; Path=/; HttpOnly
        '400':
          description: request was invalid
        '401':
          description: authentication credentials are missing
        '403':
          description: request has been refused
        '404':
          description: resource requested does not exists
        '406':
          description: request specified an invalid format
        '409':
          description: an existing item already exists
        '500':
          description: internal server error
  /logout:
    delete:
      tags:
        - security server
      summary: logout from the UI
      operationId: logout
      description: SS administrator logs out from UI.
      parameters:
        - in: header
          name: X-XSRF-TOKEN
          schema:
            type: string
            format: text
            example: fghijk678910
          required: true
      responses:
        '204':
          description: deletion was successful
        '400':
          description: request was invalid
        '401':
          description: authentication credentials are missing
        '403':
          description: request has been refused
        '404':
          description: resource requested does not exists
        '500':
          description: internal server error
components:
  securitySchemes:
    CookieAuth:
      type: apiKey
      in: cookie
      name: JSESSIONID
  schemas:
    LoginRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - username
        - password
      properties:
        username:
          type: string
          format: text
          example: username
          minLength: 4
          maxLength: 255
        password:
          type: string
          format: password
          example: Password123
          minLength: 4
          maxLength: 255
security:
  - CookieAuth: []

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/login": post: operation "login": responses: 200: headers: header "\x00Set-Cookie": at src/proxy-ui-api/src/main/resources/openapi-authentication.yaml:50:15: invalid header name "\x00Set-Cookie"
